input.sentences: we took a trip to see the waterfalls .
the view was amazing from where we were .
you could feel the mist from the falls from where we were standing .
the water falls could be seen from miles away .
once we got closer to the water falls we seen a lot of wildlife | including this butterfly .
output.sentences: They were enjoying the views to start their vacation.
Waterfalls surrounded them in every direction.
They observed some of the most beautiful scenery in the park.
Then they stood and watched the clouds float by.
Lastly, they observed some of the amazing life nature had to offer.
